info.description: Mixed Reality Resource Provider REST API
info.title: Mixed Reality

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: Result of the request to list Resource Provider operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of operations supported by the Resource Provider.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Profile, endpoint, etc.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: String that can be used to programmatically identify the error.

details.description: An array of JSON objects that MUST contain name/value pairs for code and message, and MAY contain a name/value pair for target, as described above.The contents of this section are service-defined but must adhere to the aforementioned schema.

message.description: Describes the error in detail and provides debugging information

target.description: The target of the particular error

display.description: Registers a subscription for the Mixed Reality resource provider.
display.operation: Registers the Mixed Reality resource provider
